testcase.name: Verify Add Customer functionality
testcase.system-out: Given Launch browser........................................................passed When Enter valid url "https://admin-demo.nopcommerce.com/login".............passed And Enter email as "admin@yourstore.com" and Password as "admin"............passed And click on Login..........................................................passed Then User can view dashboard................................................passed When User click on Customers menu...........................................passed And click on Customers menu item............................................passed And Click on Add new button.................................................passed Then User can see Add a new customer page...................................passed When user enter customer info...............................................passed And click on Save button....................................................passed Then User can view confirmation message "The new customer has been added successfully.".passed And close browser...........................................................passed
